nodes.text: Arami was an Outer Rim Territories world located at galactic coordinates T-13. Situated along the Triellus Trade Route, Arami was connected to the moon of Syvris and the planet Gamorr.

Arami was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Star Wars: The Force Awakens Beginner Game, a roleplaying game produced by Fantasy Flight Games and released in 2016. The world originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in "Star Wars Droids: The Adventures of R2-D2 and C-3PO", an article written by Rich Handley and Abel G. Peña that was published in Polyhedron 170 in 2004.
